title: iOS Screen Time
content:
<!--StartFragment-->

With Screen Time, you can access real-time reports about how much time you spend on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch. \
\
This way, you can make more informed decisions about how you use your devices, and set limits if you'd like to. \
\
Turn on Screen Time \
- Go to Settings > Screen Time. \
- Tap Turn On Screen Time. - Tap Continue. \
- Select This is My \[device] 



You can now get a report about how you use your device, apps, and websites, any time you want.

<!--EndFragment-->
